medium: Silk, cotton, metallic threads, glass beads, metal ornament
title: Back Streamers
description: a:  five attached large geometric pieces in turquoise, cream, dark lavender, fuscha, black; all pieces embroidered in floral designs; stitched tape edges; three long gold tassels; one metal ornament on PL tassel; pieces joined by clear glass beads; b:  13 attached pieces; four large geometric end pieces (turqouise, rose, red and black), in silk brocade, with nine bird and floral shapes connected by silvered glass beads; metal and cotton embroidered; some pieces edged in colored tape; some pieces have small colored tassels; two large red and green tassels at bottom attached with large glass beads; all pieces are embroidered; c:  five attached large geometric pieces in turquoise, dark lavender, peach, fuscha, black; all pieces embroidered in floral designs; stitched tape edges; three long green tassels; center tassel has gold metal ornament; pieces joined by clear glass beads
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
